subject: Nutrition
title: Personalized Nutrition
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Personalized Nutrition.

hook.text: Two people eating identical meals can have blood sugar responses that differ by 500%. One size fits nobody.

buildup.text: The Personalised Nutrition Project tracked 800 people and found wildly different responses to the same foods.

discovery.text: Gut microbiome composition explains much of the variationâ€”your bacteria shape how your body processes food.

twist.text: Companies sell DNA-based diet plans, but genetics explain only 5 to 10% of food response variation.

climax.text: True personalized nutrition combining genetics, microbiome, and glucose monitoring is still years away.

punchline.text: The perfect diet is different for every single person.

quiz.question: How much do genetics explain food response variation?
